meta.name: 99 to Beat
meta.description: In 99 to Beat, 100 contestants go head-to-head in a range of visually distinctive and hilarious games in an arced competition game show like we've never seen before. 99 to Beat is the game show that anyone can win, and there's only one thing players must do for a chance of walking away with the cash prize – Don't. Come. In. Last. As contestants battle it out against each other, each round will see the number of players whittled down until one person is left standing and they take home the top prize of $100,000.

videos.title: Million Dollar Winner
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Confetti Sweep, 3D Puzzle, Alphabetti Golf, Pendulum, and Grand Finale.

videos.title: The Holidays Are Coming

videos.title: Million Dollar Winner
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Confetti Sweep, 3D Puzzle, Alphabetti Golf, Pendulum, and Grand Finale.

videos.title: Don't Finish Last
videos.overview: One rule is that don't finish last; hosted by Ken Jeong and Erin Andrews, 100 contestants go head-to-head in games.

videos.title: This is NUTS!
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Find Your Name, Nut Stackers, Potato Fork Catch, Sound It Out and Slingshot Balloon.

videos.title: Families Torn Apart
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, "Needle and Thread," "Gutter Bowl," "Hook a Duck," "Disc Twerking" and "Tape Lunch Box."

videos.title: A Queen is Born
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, "Frozen Pants," "Coin in a Glass," "Tape Measure Retract," "Nail Balance" and "Domino Run."

videos.title: Who Framed Ken & Erin?
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Butterfly Catch, Balloon Cup Transfer, Piggy Bank Raid, Boat Float and Hang a Painting.

videos.title: Love Is In The Air
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Find a Light, Cotton Spool, Bubble Wrapped, Tennis Ball Weave and House of Cards.

videos.title: The Upset of the Season
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games, Land the Shot, Suitcase Curling, Pencil Jump, Untangled and Pop-Up Tent.

videos.title: Flipping Out!
videos.overview: The remaining contestants compete in five games including Upturned Cups, Spring Head, Sleeping Bag Race, Traffic Cone Flip and Arc the Ball.
